HABIT
  • 生境特征提取
  • 查看页面源码

生境特征提取

HabitatMapAnalyzer 类

class habit.core.habitat_analysis.analyzers.habitat_analyzer.HabitatMapAnalyzer(params_file_of_non_habitat=None, params_file_of_habitat=None, raw_img_folder=None, habitats_map_folder=None, out_dir=None, n_processes=None, habitat_pattern=None, voxel_cutoff=10)[源代码]

基类：object

Habitat Map Analyzer Class (Refactored)

This class provides functionality for extracting various features from habitat maps: 1. Radiomic features of raw images within different habitats 2. Radiomic features of habitats within the entire ROI 3. Number of disconnected regions and volume percentage for each habitat 4. MSI (Mutual Spatial Integrity) features from habitat maps 5. ITH (Intratumoral Heterogeneity) index from habitat maps

extract_features(images_paths, habitat_paths, mask_paths=None, feature_types=None)[源代码]

Extract habitat features for all subjects

get_mask_and_raw_files()[源代码]

Get paths to all original images and habitat maps

process_subject(subj, images_paths, habitat_paths, mask_paths=None, feature_types=None)[源代码]

Process a single subject for habitat feature extraction

run(feature_types: List[str] | None = None, n_habitats: int | None = None)[源代码]

Run the complete analysis pipeline

参数:

  • feature_types – Types of features to extract

  • n_habitats – Number of habitats to process (None for auto detection)

HabitatRadiomicsExtractor 类

ITHFeatureExtractor 类

class habit.core.habitat_analysis.analyzers.ith_features.ITHFeatureExtractor[源代码]

基类：object

Extractor class for Intratumoral Heterogeneity (ITH) scores

extract_ith_features(habitat_img: str | Image) → Dict[源代码]

Calculate ITH score directly from a habitat image

参数:

habitat_img – SimpleITK image or path to habitat map file

返回:

Dictionary containing ITH score and related features

返回类型:

Dict

MSIFeatureExtractor 类

class habit.core.habitat_analysis.analyzers.msi_features.MSIFeatureExtractor(voxel_cutoff=10)[源代码]

基类：object

Extractor class for MSI features

calculate_MSI_features(msi_matrix: ndarray, name: str) → Dict[源代码]

Calculate MSI features from the MSI matrix

参数:

  • msi_matrix – MSI matrix

  • name – Prefix for feature names

返回:

Calculated MSI features

返回类型:

Dict

calculate_MSI_matrix(habitat_array: ndarray, unique_class: int) → ndarray[源代码]

Calculate the MSI matrix from habitat array

参数:

  • habitat_array – Array representing the habitat map

  • unique_class – Number of habitat classes (including background)

返回:

Calculated MSI matrix

返回类型:

msi_matrix

extract_MSI_features(habitat_path: str, n_habitats: int, subj: str) → Dict[源代码]

Extract MSI features from a single habitat map

参数:

  • habitat_path – Path to the habitat map file

  • n_habitats – Number of habitats

  • subj – Subject ID

返回:

Extracted MSI features

返回类型:

Dict

BasicFeatureExtractor 类

class habit.core.habitat_analysis.analyzers.basic_features.BasicFeatureExtractor[源代码]

基类：object

Extractor class for basic habitat features

static get_non_radiomics_features(habitat_img)[源代码]

Calculate number of disconnected regions and volume ratio for each habitat

参数:

habitat_img – SimpleITK image or path to habitat map file

返回:

Dictionary containing basic features for each habitat

返回类型:

Dict
